Articles.Content: Like the title says, are mods for 1.0 compatible with 1.0.2?
should be don't know why the wouldn't.

> 
> should be don't know why the wouldn't.

Well mainly because its a different version. I'm not to versed in programing so I'm not sure.

Most are.

Some claim they're not, usually due to code checking for version 1.0.0 specifically rather than a more relaxed 1.0. 

Some might not be in case a 1.0.1/1.0.2 bugfix or change caused some behavior changes for the mod.
